Line1.EDC7D: Brothers and sisters of the Triune! You are hereby called upon to witness the unveiling of a new weapon in our fight to win Sanctuary.
Line3.EDC7D: He shall slumber until called upon. On the next blood moon, gather at the Altar and awaken him with us!
Line5.EDC7D: In a feat of necromantic expertise, our members have patched together a fearsome warrior, sculpted from the bodies of fallen legends.  The Cathedral boasts of their angelâ€”we now have a contender.
